Terms of Sale:
All items are offered prior to previous sale. All books are complete, octavo in size and in good antiquarian condition, unless otherwise stated. Original prices are in EURO; postage and insurance are extra. Packing is included. Payment is to be made via Abebooks or by direct SWIFT transfer to our bank account or to Paypal.com. New customers are requested to remit payment upon receipt of pro forma invoice prior to shipment. Transactions are made under Swedish law. Books may be returned within ten...

Shipping Terms:
Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighting 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you, to let you know that extra shipping is required.
